name: Stay Away (Yusufss)
description:
My first game , everything belongs to me except the musics.

(Tek başıma geliştirdiğim  , müzik hariç bana ait olan oyun. )

How to Play?

W-A-S-D - Movement

Left mouse button - Shoot

You can pause game with escape button

You can see more information in info menu at start

Discord : Yusufs#1110

Please feedback bugs and other mistakes to me.
